name: System Malfunction
storyline:
You are a new security guard assigned to the night shift.
While performing your duties, you become entangled in bizarre events occurring within the building.
What happened in this building in the past, and why are these strange phenomena happening now?
Can you unravel the mystery?
summary: "System Malfunction" is a first-person horror game set in a mysterious building. The player takes on the role of a security guard who witnesses strange occurrences during the night shift. In a fear-inducing environment, the player explores the building to uncover hidden truths.
